import "./post.css" import MoreVertIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVert'; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; import { useState } from "react"; import React from "react"; export default function Post({post}) { const [like,setLike] = useState(post.like) const [isliked,setIsLiked] = useState(false) const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER; const likeHandler =()=>{ setLike(isliked ? like-1 : like+1) setIsLiked(!isliked) } return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) =>u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
